column4: i'd like to advertise something like that: "the NEW generation with SHITTY performance"
I have that!
that's why i buy matrox cards
and old ones too :)
you know, you can't really decide what's in your laptop
back when I used desktops I also used matrox too :)
I have a G400 in the PII box, which replaced the G200
i'm still at the desktop era. carrying machines around is silly, something like a nokia communicator is good enough
I want laptops because they're small and quiet
so is my phone (not so small, but pretty quiet :)
I doubt your phone runs eclipse, though
no, but it runs putty, nethack and doom. good enough
as I said before... "work" ;)
depends on the "work" :)
a communicator is no more expensive than a laptop though
well, a work that requires you to run doom and nethack should be pretty fun
well, but I hate symbian and nokia
i love it!
symbian does suck though
I'd like the 770
yes, once it becomes a phone (voip is planned for the future)
i also like the communicator's keyboard and display
